text: (ivarkalaippol innum veru) pala napimarkalaiyum (nam anuppi vaittom). Avarkalutaiya carittirankalaiyum itarku munnar nam umakkuk kuriyirukkirom. Veru pala napimarkalaiyum (nam anuppiyirukkirom. Eninum) avarkalutaiya carittirankalai nam umakkuk kuravillai. Musavu(kku vahyi arivittatu)tan allah peciyum irukkiran
